reviewText: Arrived on time as described. Video was well paced. Mark Brady did a terrific job of providing demonstrations by his student athletes as the drills are described. I am a long time track coach and loved it. Played it. Stopped to rewind and played again. Took notes and was able to implement two of them the next day. I would not only recommend this for beginners looking for a starting point but even a long time gray beard like myself who can pick up a few new tricks. For example he had a drill he called his "Max Velocity Run" that I found worth the money of the video in itself!!!
